snippet: As president, Dennis Williams faces difficult contract talks in 2015 with the three major automakers — General Motors, Ford and Chrysler.
abstract: United Automobile Workers union elects Dennis Williams to four-year term as its president.
lead_paragraph: As president, Dennis Williams faces difficult contract talks in 2015 with the three major automakers — General Motors, Ford and Chrysler.

headline.main: U.A.W. Elects President Who Vows Single Term
headline.print_headline: U.A.W. Elects President Who Vows Single Term
